attributes.action: Make election manifesto legally binding if elected to government.
attributes.additional_details:
We were promised £ 100,000 of estate safe from care home taxes still only a quarter of that.
Both major parties campaign on a brexit manifesto of which both have faltered on along the past 2 years.
attributes.background: Past political parties have used their election manifestos to entice votes based on PROMISES  that are never kept. Manifestos today are just lies used to draw votes . The truth needs to be at the front line of politics so making a manifesto legally binding if elected would cut out the lies.
